Has anyone found a good setting for the audio sync problem in VLC media player.  Usually I can figure it out by playing with the settings in the Adjustments and Effects menu, but the audio is so far off that I have not been able to get the "advance of audio over video" setting correct.  Has anyone got a good, solid +/- number setting yet?

I FIGURED OUT THE AUDIO TIMING

IM USING CCCP or MPC

AND THE AUDIO SETTING FOR ME ARE 

-3600 ms
damn it...it was -3600 now its like -6000
when u see snape/snake what ever the hell his name is ...set it to -9000
For me, I use AC3 filter, and in the settings while the video is playing (use icon on taskbar) goto system tab and put -3.925e+004 into the jitter box.
